website_summaries.verdict: Removes tough makeup without being tough on the skin.
pros: Effectively removes liquid liner, heavy eyeshadow, and waterproof mascara with ease
Gentle formula glides over skin without painful tugging or scrubbing
Effectively removes long-lasting lip products as well
A little product goes a long way
cons: Product is quite oily and may need to be rinsed off afterward

website_summaries.verdict: Non-oily remover that dissolves stubborn makeup effortlessly.
pros: Good quality for the price, with a lot of dedicated users
Needs to be left on the face for a few seconds before wiping off, but is gentle and effective
cons: Some found it left an oily residue

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Like The Actual
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Clinique Take The Day Off for 5+ years, I usually buy from Sephora or Bloomingdales. Was about to run out, so I bought on Amazon. The product arrived and the oil is milky white, nothing at all like the actual Clinique product which is clear. Returning with a replacement. Hope the next one is ok
customer_reviews.author: K1mmyNYC17

customer_reviews.title: This works amazingly well on all makeup
customer_reviews.text: This really works on all makeup especially eye makeup, I love this stuff - The Girlfriend One of the very best makeup removers one can buy. PROS: -Very effective at removing eye makeup -Gentle to your skin especially under and around your eyes (even for sensitive skin and people) -Works wonders on waterproof mascara -Works well for lipstick CONS: - Only the cost, but it does last at least 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: rrecko

customer_reviews.title: Not what I get from Clinique. See pictures.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT what you get from Clinique. I have been getting this from Clinique for years, first time on here, and never again. Mine is separated into two distinct forms in the bottle ... A white and a clear. I don't know if it's watered down or what, but it's not what I get from Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I had another new bottle of Clinique Take the Day ...
customer_reviews.text: I had another new bottle of Clinique Take the Day Off from the department store in my cabinet. This bottle from Amazon looked the same, but the product was different. It was cloudy and I was afraid to use it, especially on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Doody

customer_reviews.title: Scammed
customer_reviews.text: This product is supposed to be take the day off make up remover sold by Clinique. Instead I received a reused bottle filled with some strange substance that had a large soapy looking clump in the middle. Thank goodness I am familiar with this product and didn’t use it in my eyes. Who knows what could have happened!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tredinnick

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely NOT a Clinique product. This is milky and looks like soap. I have used this product for years and it should be clear.
customer_reviews.author: Annie T

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be watered down...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this remover twice at the Clinique counter in dept. stores and then I saw it on Amazon for less $$ so I ordered one. It came looking like water and oil mixed together in a bottle. Almost like oil & vinegar dressing but totally clear like the original one I get a Clinique. I'm going to guess it had water added to it because of the looks AND because it takes a lot more of the product to remove makeup than the ones from the store. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Janie G. McKeithan

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite eye make up remover
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eye make up remover. I use to use eye make up remover wipes, but they aren't even on the same playing field as this stuff. To use place a cotton ball on the opening, give it a tip upside down so the liquid soaks in a little bit, then glide across yours eyes. It's so gentle, it effortlessly takes the makeup off. No burning or irritation.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL THING
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with other reviewers, this is not the REAL take the Day off remover. It smells different and is super greasy. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Grady

customer_reviews.title: takeeeee me out to the...................
customer_reviews.text: This remover may be the best yet :-) I bought for me sis and she loves it. I found a neat gift idea instead of the usual fruit cakes from now on, This doesn't leave your makeup running and leaves you looking like some wicked witch who came in from a rain storm. Also if you are already scary looking on Halloween you can apply this to your face to clean you up rather quickly. So I guess the gourmet amazon reviewer gives this 2 thumbs up! Also, it's not too greasy when applying. Might be a bit pricey but do you wanna look good or look like some scary Shaun of the Dead victim character?
customer_reviews.author: Pankil

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for waterproof mascara.  Feels smooth.  Can cause short-term vision fuzziness from oil
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a fan of this remover. Works amazingly well taking off waterproof mascara. Much more effective than Clinique’s blue remover, and I prefer this to the other products in the take-the-day-off line. Two swipes with a cotton ball on each eyelid and they are clean. A small amount of vision fuzziness from the oil remains for a few moments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is allergic to so many products, I love this make-up remover. It is gentle, only has a mild scent, and takes off the toughest to remove eye and lip make-up. A long-time favorite at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen1012

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and it came soaked in the box! It has leaked all over. The seal was broken which means it was nice safe to use! The product inside the bottle stank and had a clump of white stuff inside the bottle! I sent it back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Neda Armanfar

customer_reviews.title: Look closely at the liquid contents
customer_reviews.text: Look closely at the liquid. This is not the same as the products purchased at Macy's. The bottle also seems to be in a used condition not brand new. When the item I purchased came I can see the oil on the bottom and half water sitting on top. The Macy's Clinique products do not have the same half way mark. I've used Clinique products for many years and I know the difference. Luckily I was able to get a refund for this and purchase from Macys to show you the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Girlie Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: It is an oil that cleans. It gets makeup off and if patient can remove mascara after a few tries while being gentle to the kashes
customer_reviews.author: Marien

customer_reviews.title: Package was already opened or tampered with
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in poor condition. It appeared to have been already opened and looked to be watered down or tampered with in some other way. The product came with a barcode and product name on the side which looked to be beaten up and worn down somehow. Made me feel like this was not a new bottle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyani Narayan

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised, works perfectly. For traveling it needs to be in a plastic bag, as it will leak. I wish Clinique would make a better bottle that didn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have used this product for years and it is great for removing eye make up! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was part of a gift package of Clinique ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was part of a gift package of Clinique because it was written on it that it cannot be sold separately! And as an experienced user of this make up remover, I am not really sure that this the original product on the bottle I received.
customer_reviews.author: Omur Ilbas

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remove ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup remover I've ever tried. Every once in a while I try something else, but always come back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne V

customer_reviews.title: Efficient eye makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: Love this for eye makeup removal. Makeup comes off without oulling and tugging on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the fact that it didn't come in a box ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the fact that it didn't come in a box that kind of makes me think it's not an original Clinique product. I still haven't tried it yet but I will be updating my review once I try and compare to the original product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Is this really Clinique
customer_reviews.text: I've used this item for many years and decided to buy online. This particular batch is not removing my eye makeup as well as the bottles I've bought at the store. MMMmmmmm
customer_reviews.author: BCDavis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks like water was added to the bottle. "Oil and water doesn't mix". Half and half.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Roney

customer_reviews.title: Do it! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. And it's a much better price than at make up stores.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: A Classic!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I can buy my favorite Clinique product on Amazon. So happy to have found this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product ever since I got a sample in a gift pack. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Take the Day Off
customer_reviews.text: Great product so glad it is available on Amazon. Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Removes eye and lip makeup with ease
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. Works wonders on water proof mascara and even on red lips! I've had other eye makeup removers that have burnt my face or stung my eyes. No problems with this! I just apply some to a cotton round and wipe away!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Two bottles in one box. Okay. Needed internal bubbles or something to prevent bottles from knocking against each other.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy & Linda Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This came with a mass of something in the bottle. We have tried to get rid of it but it’s worse. Scare to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works the beast for removing all makeup from your face. Easy to use and gentle on the skin. Easy transaction
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best product for mascara removal
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Clinique product! Works great to take off eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Creager

customer_reviews.title: Best for mature skin.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It takes off mascara, lip rouge, and foundation with ease, and doesn't dry out your skin. I have over 50 skin so it's perfect for me. Washes away easily.
customer_reviews.author: Helen E. Mansell

customer_reviews.title: arrived frozen
customer_reviews.text: the product was frozen when arrived It is no good because the oil in product is now permanently separated
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! It is my favorite make-up remover. Yet I did find one fault and that was that it is a very greasy substance, that will leave a residue on the boddle and maybe your face as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Wagner

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have tried a lot of eye makeup remover, but this is my favorite. Eyes aren't greasy and the makeup comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B.

customer_reviews.title: Removes mascara and eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: Clinique removes eye make up really well. There's no residue and I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Piazza

customer_reviews.title: This product works.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It works better than any other one I've tried. One swipe and it removes eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: E Walland

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😕
customer_reviews.text: For some reason when I pour this out of the bottle, it seperates and doesn't clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Harris

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It gets my make up off without the burn and irritation that comes from a few other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for quite a few years. It is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Scalir

customer_reviews.title: If you want to take all your eye makeup off, get this.
customer_reviews.text: It's the only eye makeup remover that truly takes my heavy duty black mascara and black liquid eyeliner off. I easily break out and I have no problems with this (even though it has a slightly greasy feel to it).
customer_reviews.author: kdnthirteen

customer_reviews.title: my favorite makeup remover!
customer_reviews.text: As far as oil-based removers go, I love this particular product from Clinique. I've tried Lancome brand, and would recommend this over Lancome. I also like and use Mary Kay eye-makeup remover when I prefer an oil free formula for touch-ups in the morning. Clinique Take The Day off is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolina

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. Ive tried others and nothing compared.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Clinque made this one of the best makeup removers I have ever tried! Takes thick mascara off with ease yayyy!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ligaya

customer_reviews.title: It’s too bad.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not good. It’s too bad. I’m not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite make-up remover for water proof mascara
customer_reviews.author: motherheart

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so good for removing my waterproof mascara. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ASE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy on eyes, works easily on waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: It's a Complete make up remover.
customer_reviews.text: Clinique make up remover takes off all my make up, effortlessly. Does not leave my face dry.
customer_reviews.author: Diana garcia

customer_reviews.title: Clinque Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I always used Clinique cleansers and of course like many others love the ideal of shopping from home. I also like the price being that I save more shopping through Amazon. Overall: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Clinique...Great Value and Great skin care!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! All Clinique items are so good for my skin as well as very fairly priced for great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Was worried it would be a knock off but was exactly as I would by in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Seagren

customer_reviews.title: Broke Open
customer_reviews.text: The item I orderered was broke open wen I opened the package. And the liquid was everywhere in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Sabra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff.. only thing that works with little effort. been buying for years!
customer_reviews.author: S. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Best eye makeup remover!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It's so gentle even for sensitive eyes! Been a Clinique customer for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah vendetta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite eye makeup remover. Non-greasy like some of the cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.author: Joviemom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY make up remover to use. I get it in my eyes on a regular basis, and it never burns or itches. The only thing that removes make-up the FIRST time. It's a little pricey, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Best remover!
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup remover! Takes off makeup easily and does not leave a oily film
customer_reviews.author: April & Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Check the amount in the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I felt that the price of the product was too much for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: No more racoon eyes for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first eye makeup remover that ACTUALLY removes make up the first time you try it. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SusanS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with packaging, especially since it is in liquid form.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. A bit oily, but comes off when you wash your face.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my favorite makeup remover that does not make my skin feel oily!
customer_reviews.author: supachomp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does it job removes water proof mascara better than any other product I have tried
customer_reviews.author: l arwood

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came to me empty because it had all leaked out. I paid $26.00 for an empty bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best remover ever, a touch of an oil feel but clean and very gentle on eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: GOOD Remover
customer_reviews.text: Good eye makeup remover for very tough waterproof makeup. However, the lid doesn't close very well so it has leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Love Dogs 4

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with top not properly closed, so there was a lot of leaking. Top may be broken because I'm having trouble getting it to screw on tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Van Hook

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Take the Day Off is the only makeup remover I've found that really does take off waterproof mascara of any brand.
customer_reviews.author: River H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend because it works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. My mother and grandmother used Clinque. Highly recommend because it works
customer_reviews.author: Karyle Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the few products that takes off my waterproof mascara completely. It's saving my lashes for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years, and will continue to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this eye makeup remover. I use water proof/smudge proof mascara and eye liner and this does a nice job removing it all. It's not oily and doesn't leave my eyes or lashing feeling oily. I have used Sephora's water proof mascara eye makeup remover in the past, but I will probably stick with this one. It's a great product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bwahlman

customer_reviews.title: Myagy as silk!
customer_reviews.text: Great facility. Advised girlfriend) Be sure to buy more)) Convenient to take the compact bottle in the road or going to a gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jenechka

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Clnique products!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the best Clinique products. It does a great job of removing eye makeup - and other make-up!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Renee Story

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle and works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is gentle and removes even the heaviest eye makeup without a problem. I have tried others, but rate this #1.
customer_reviews.author: halloween

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The oil separated and even if you shake it, doesn't mix. Not the same as in store.
customer_reviews.author: deyon

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin soft...
customer_reviews.text: Clinique take the day off Does just that! This stuff is awesome. I only wear mascara and this takes it off FAST. I have sensitive skin and this doesn't break me out at all. I would recommend this to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: Tbird

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute ONLY makeup remover that takes off ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute ONLY makeup remover that takes off my Maybelline 24 hour lipstick. It's smooth on your skin works wonders. I've used this for ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Take the Day Off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this excellent product at far under the retail store cost. It is non-greasy, yet removes eye makeup without rubbing and leaves your eyes feeling refreshed. It's nice not waking up to raccoon eyes anymore!
customer_reviews.author: SaBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser. Does a great job of removing all make-up but doesn't leave my face oily.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: This product feels great and removed my eye makeup with ease
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic. This product feels great and removed my eye makeup with ease. I wanted to be able to use it but I am allergic. I am very sensitive around my eyes but this was recommended by a friend and it says "safe for sensitive skin". I tried it and it made my eyes swell up by the next morning. Not severly but if I continue to use it I am sure it will get worse. I am sure most people could use this and would love it. I just wanted my fellow sensitve skin people to know before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye makeup remover I have ever used and I've used Clinique Take the Day off remover for many years. It is especially good for removing eye makeup. It's gentle and very efficient and comfortable to use. It also easily, quickly and efficiently removes all of your makeup but I love it most for removing eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: jojesta

customer_reviews.title: Used and faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Received the bottle opened and as if something was added to It perhaps coconut oil? Felt it from the smell.. I am hoping a refund after they receive my return shipment which is totally unfair because I didn’t signed up for this!!
customer_reviews.author: nif nif

customer_reviews.title: good remover
customer_reviews.text: This eye makeup remover is good, but not as good as Lancome Bi facils... It is cheaper, but takes more product to get the same results.. I am sticking with lancome
customer_reviews.author: Anglwyngs

customer_reviews.title: This is the best makeup remover for waterproof mascara I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best makeup remover for waterproof mascara I have ever used! It must be shaken prior to use to get the 2 products mixed; otherwise, one stays on the bottom and one on the top, sort of like oil and water. It doesn't work if you don't shake the container. I then dip a cotton swab into the solution and wipe across the eyelid. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria D.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I trust it.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item a week ago. When it arrived it looked frozen, with oily cloudy bubbles. (Ligit looks like clouds floating) figured it was just frozen from shipping as alot of cold weather and storms right now. I let it sit till this morning as I had some left in my other bottle. Well it has been a week and still looks like this. And when I opened.....there is no safety seal inside. What's up with this.......
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Larsen

customer_reviews.title: the only product i buy
customer_reviews.text: i have bought this for years and years. you can put this directly in your eye basically and you don't feel a thing - it's like water. it takes off all your makeup in a second! i love this product and recommend it to everyone. it lasts forever and worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing eye makeup!! Gentle, yet effective!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and works effectively! I'm using this to remove eye makeup and it works great! It's gentle, doesn't burn, and easy on sensitive skin, easy to use! I use cotton pads to gently wipe away mascara, eyeliner and eye shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Always use Clinique
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Clinique for eye makeup removal. It takes off my makeup in one clean swipe and I don’t have to rub at it or use other products with it. I’d say be minimal because it can be pretty oily on your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Have used this product for years
customer_reviews.text: Eyemakeup easily is removed. A little more than needed for traveling, but I have some small sizes of this product that I re-fill from this container, which works just fine. I have used this product for years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: You may as well buy the drug store brand, way cheaper and same effect.
customer_reviews.text: I use this before i wash my face, I use it after i wash my face (3 times) and i still wake up with racoon eyes??? not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lana D.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky tape on cap and bottle. No box.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but I am not sure that is what I received in the mail. The bottle was not in a box and the top was sealed with tape, which, when removed, left a terrible sticky residue on the cap as well as on the bottle. I am going to send it back because I am not sure it hasn't been tampered with before I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Spotted girl

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Cliniques 3 step system since 2010 and added this eye makeup remover and nothing else I’ve used even compares. Sure it’s advertised as an eye makeup remover but this removes any makeup and leaves your skin feeling smooth, that is especially great for around the eyes. Hands down the best makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry M

customer_reviews.title: Best eye makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: Love this clinique product. No burning on eyes when removing. I use my fingers then a tissue. Takes off all types of mascara
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Casey

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a second chance and happy I did
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue last time I ordered this; the product had way too much oil. Gave it a second chance and happy I did. I use this to remove eye makeup at the end of the day, and it works great without making your skin feel too dry or too oily. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: vtellen

customer_reviews.title: Not the real stuff- fake product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Clinique take the day off makeup remover for years. This, unfortunately, is not the same product. This was a different consistency and formula. This left an oily film all over my skin. My bottle was not sealed. NOT an authentic product- rip off!!! Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.author: SDF

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy solution
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet, because the solution is so cloudy. I use this brand all the time and I’ve never seen the bottle cloudy like this.
customer_reviews.author: LizMac

product_meta.title: Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover, 4.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes & Lips 125ml/4.2oz
